text: Speaker Karu Jayasuriya, MPs, and the staff of the Parliament will participate at this event.A Bodhi Pooja ceremony to invoke blessings to Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe, who completes 40 years of his political life will be held tomorrow (4thAug.) at the Parliamentary Complex. Speaker Karu Jayasuriya, MPs, and the staff of the Parliament will participate at this event.
title: Bodhi Pooja at Parliamentary Complex
